price: 61. cambiar vuestra apariencia[1007] y transformaros en algo que ignoráis.
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَٰلَكُمۡ وَنُنشِئَكُمۡ فِي مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: [1007]  También puede significar: «(Nada Nos impide) sustituiros por otra gente».

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila amthālakum wanunshi-akum fī mā lā taʿlamūna
